data.actual_result: Games on the edges are just out of reach and cannot easily be seen!
data.expected_result: You are able to scroll through all of the games!
data.short_description: [Marketing Website][Mobile] Phones in Portrait cannot see all games on new Nitro page!
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the new Marketing page for Nitro : discordapp/nitro - Scroll down to "Get access to over $1,000 worth of games" - Scroll (left and right) through the games, and notice the last game on either side is just out of reach of scrolling too - (Don't use 2 fingers as this seems to cause it to allow over scrolling)
